meanings.sent2: The misentered address led the delivery person to the wrong house.
meanings.sent3: The misentered password made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her misentered name painted a confusing picture.
meanings.sent5: The misentered data stood out like a sore thumb.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake in entering information.
meanings.sent1: He misentered the phone number in his contacts.
meanings.sent2: She misentered the date of the event in the calendar.
meanings.sent3: The cashier misentered the price and gave me a discount.
meanings.sent4: The detective misentered a crucial clue in the report.
meanings.sent5: The student misentered the answer and lost points on the test.
